verses.verse: וּבְיוֹם֩ <WH3117> day עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> Now in the twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֜ה <WH702> and fourth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> of this month הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> of this נֶאֶסְפ֤וּ <WH622> were assembled בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel בְּצ֣וֹם <WH6685> with fasting וּבְשַׂקִּ֔ים <WH8242> and with sackclothes וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> and earth עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and

וַיִּבָּֽדְלוּ֙ <WH914> separated זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> And the seed יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> afflicted נֵכָ֑ר <WH5236> alien וַיַּעַמְד֗וּ <WH5975> and stood וַיִּתְוַדּוּ֙ <WH3034> and confessed עַל־ <WH5921> and חַטֹּ֣אתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH2403> their sins וַעֲוֹנ֖וֹת <WH5771> and the iniquities אֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

וַיָּק֙וּמוּ֙ <WH6965> And they stood up עַל־ <WH5921> in עָמְדָ֔ם <WH5977> in their place וַֽיִּקְרְא֗וּ <WH7121> and read בְּסֵ֨פֶר <WH5612> in the book תּוֹרַ֧ת <WH8451> of the law יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> their God רְבִעִ֣ית <WH7243> [one] fourth part הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> of the day וּרְבִעִית֙ <WH7243> and [another] fourth part מִתְוַדִּ֣ים <WH3034> they confessed וּמִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֔ים <WH7812> and worshipped לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> their God פ

וַיָּ֜קָם <WH6965> Then stood up עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon מַֽעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4608> upon the stairs הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> of the Levites יֵשׁ֨וּעַ <WH3442> Jeshua וּבָנִ֜י <WH1137> and Bani קַדְמִיאֵ֧ל <WH6934> Kadmiel שְׁבַנְיָ֛ה <WH7645> Shebaniah בֻּנִּ֥י <WH1138> Bunni שֵׁרֵבְיָ֖ה <WH8274> Sherebiah בָּנִ֣י <WH1137> Bani כְנָ֑נִי <WH3662> [and] Chenani וַֽיִּזְעֲקוּ֙ <WH2199> and cried בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> with a loud אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> their God

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> said הַלְוִיִּ֡ם <WH3881> Then the Levites יֵשׁ֣וּעַ <WH3442> Jeshua וְ֠קַדְמִיאֵל <WH6934> and Kadmiel בָּנִ֨י <WH1137> Bani חֲשַׁבְנְיָ֜ה <WH2813> Hashabniah שֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֤ה <WH8274> Sherebiah הֽוֹדִיָּה֙ <WH1941> Hodijah שְׁבַנְיָ֣ה <WH7645> Shebaniah פְתַֽחְיָ֔ה <WH6611> [and] Pethahiah ק֗וּמוּ <WH6965> Stand up בָּרֲכוּ֙ <WH1288> [and] bless אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God מִן־ <WH4480> at הָעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever עַד־ <WH5704> against הָעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> and ever וִיבָֽרְכוּ֙ <WH1288> and blessed שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name כְּבוֹדֶ֔ךָ <WH3519> be thy glorious וּמְרוֹמַ֥ם <WH7311> which is exalted עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּרָכָ֖ה <WH1293> above all blessing וּתְהִלָּֽה׃ <WH8416> and praise

אַתָּה־ <WH859> you ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Thou [even] thou [art] LORD לְבַדֶּךָ֒ <WH905> alone [אַתְּ כ] (אַתָּ֣ה <WH853> ק) עָשִׂ֡יתָ <WH6213> alone thou hast made אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַיִם֩ <WH8064> heaven שְׁמֵ֨י <WH8064> the heaven הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> of heavens וְכָל־ <WH3605> all צְבָאָ֗ם <WH6635> with all their host הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> that עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> is on הַיַּמִּים֙ <WH3220> and all [things] that [are] therein the seas וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after בָּהֶ֔ם וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> You מְחַיֶּ֣ה <WH2421> and all that [is] therein and thou preservest אֶת־ <WH853> כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> to all וּצְבָ֥א <WH6635> them all and the host הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven לְךָ֥ מִשְׁתַּחֲוִֽים׃ <WH7812> worshippeth

אַתָּה־ <WH859> you הוּא֙ <WH1931> You יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Thou [art] the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> the God אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Who בָּחַ֙רְתָּ֙ <WH977> who didst choose בְּאַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> Abram וְהוֹצֵאת֖וֹ <WH3318> and broughtest him forth מֵא֣וּר <WH218> out of Ur כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> of the Chaldees וְשַׂ֥מְתָּ <WH7760> and gavest שְּׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> him the name אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <WH85> of Abraham

וּמָצָ֣אתָ <WH4672> And foundest אֶת־ <WH853> לְבָבוֹ֮ <WH3824> his heart נֶאֱמָ֣ן <WH539> faithful לְפָנֶיךָ֒ <WH6440> before וְכָר֨וֹת <WH3772> thee and madest עִמּ֜וֹ <WH5973> with הַבְּרִ֗ית <WH1285> a covenant לָתֵ֡ת <WH5414> with him to give אֶת־ <WH853> אֶרֶץ֩ <WH776> the land הַכְּנַעֲנִ֨י <WH3669> of the Canaanites הַחִתִּ֜י <WH2850> the Hittites הָאֱמֹרִ֧י <WH567> the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֛י <WH6522> and the Perizzites וְהַיְבוּסִ֥י <WH2983> and the Jebusites וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֖י <WH1622> and the Girgashites לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> to give לְזַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> [it I say] to his seed וַתָּ֙קֶם֙ <WH6965> and hast performed אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרֶ֔יךָ <WH1697> thy words כִּ֥י <WH3588> for צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> for thou [art] righteous אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> You

וַתֵּ֛רֶא <WH7200> And didst see אֶת־ <WH853> עֳנִ֥י <WH6040> the affliction אֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1> of our fathers בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וְאֶת־ <WH853> זַעֲקָתָ֥ם <WH2201> their cry שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <WH8085> and heardest עַל־ <WH5921> and יַם־ <WH3220> sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> by the Red

וַ֠תִּתֵּן <WH5414> And shewedst אֹתֹ֨ת <WH226> signs וּמֹֽפְתִ֜ים <WH4159> and wonders בְּפַרְעֹ֤ה <WH6547> upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> and on all his servants וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עַ֣ם <WH5971> and on all the people אַרְצ֔וֹ <WH776> of his land כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> for thou knewest כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הֵזִ֖ידוּ <WH2102> that they dealt proudly עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> toward וַתַּֽעַשׂ־ <WH6213> against them So didst thou get לְךָ֥ שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> thee a name כְּהַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְהַיָּם֙ <WH3220> the sea בָּקַ֣עְתָּ <WH1234> And thou didst divide לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> before וַיַּֽעַבְר֥וּ <WH5674> them so that they went through בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> the midst הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> of the sea בַּיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <WH3004> on the dry land וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֨דְפֵיהֶ֜ם <WH7291> and their persecutors הִשְׁלַ֧כְתָּ <WH7993> thou threwest בִמְצוֹלֹ֛ת <WH4688> into the deeps כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> Like אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> as a stone בְּמַ֥יִם <WH4325> waters עַזִּֽים׃ <WH5794> into the mighty

וּבְעַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> pillar עָנָ֔ן <WH6051> by a cloudy הִנְחִיתָ֖ם <WH5148> Moreover thou leddest יוֹמָ֑ם <WH3119> them in the day וּבְעַמּ֥וּד <WH5982> by a pillar אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> of fire לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> and in the night לְהָאִ֣יר <WH215> to give them light לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יֵֽלְכוּ־ <WH1980> go בָֽהּ׃

וְעַ֤ל <WH5921> on הַר־ <WH2022> also upon mount סִינַי֙ <WH5514> Sinai יָרַ֔דְתָּ <WH3381> Thou camest down וְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> and spakest עִמָּהֶ֖ם <WH5973> from מִשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> with them from heaven וַתִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> and gavest לָהֶ֜ם מִשְׁפָּטִ֤ים <WH4941> judgments יְשָׁרִים֙ <WH3477> them right וְתוֹר֣וֹת <WH8451> laws אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> and true חֻקִּ֥ים <WH2706> statutes וּמִצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> and commandments טוֹבִֽים׃ <WH2896> good

וְאֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבַּ֥ת <WH7676> sabbath קָדְשְׁךָ֖ <WH6944> unto them thy holy הוֹדַ֣עַתָ <WH3045> And madest known לָהֶ֑ם וּמִצְו֤וֹת <WH4687> them precepts וְחֻקִּים֙ <WH2706> statutes וְתוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> and laws צִוִּ֣יתָ <WH6680> and commandedst לָהֶ֔ם בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> of Moses עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> thy servant

וְ֠לֶחֶם <WH3899> them bread מִשָּׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> from heaven נָתַ֤תָּה <WH5414> And gavest לָהֶם֙ לִרְעָבָ֔ם <WH7458> for their hunger וּמַ֗יִם <WH4325> water מִסֶּ֛לַע <WH5553> for them out of the rock הוֹצֵ֥אתָ <WH3318> and broughtest forth לָהֶ֖ם לִצְמָאָ֑ם <WH6772> for their thirst וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and promisedst לָהֶ֗ם לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> them that they should go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָשָׂ֥אתָ <WH5375> accept אֶת־ <WH853> יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> able לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give לָהֶֽם׃

וְהֵ֥ם <WH1992> they וַאֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1> But they and our fathers הֵזִ֑ידוּ <WH2102> dealt proudly וַיַּקְשׁוּ֙ <WH7185> and hardened אֶת־ <WH853> עָרְפָּ֔ם <WH6203> their necks וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> and hearkened אֶל־ <WH413> to מִצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4687> not to thy commandments

וַיְמָאֲנ֣וּ <WH3985> And refused לִשְׁמֹ֗עַ <WH8085> to obey וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and did not זָכְר֤וּ <WH2142> neither were mindful נִפְלְאֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6381> of thy wonders אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> that thou didst עִמָּהֶ֔ם <WH5973> among וַיַּקְשׁוּ֙ <WH7185> among them but hardened אֶת־ <WH853> עָרְפָּ֔ם <WH6203> their necks וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> appointed רֹ֛אשׁ <WH7218> a captain לָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> to return לְעַבְדֻתָ֖ם <WH5659> to their bondage בְּמִרְיָ֑ם <WH4805> and in their rebellion וְאַתָּה֩ <WH859> you אֱל֨וֹהַּ <WH433> but thou [art] a God סְלִיח֜וֹת <WH5547> ready to pardon חַנּ֧וּן <WH2587> gracious וְרַח֛וּם <WH7349> and merciful אֶֽרֶךְ־ <WH750> slow אַפַּ֥יִם <WH639> to anger וְרַב־ <WH7227> and of great [וְחֶסֶד כ] (חֶ֖סֶד <WH2617> favour ק) וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not עֲזַבְתָּֽם׃ <WH5800> and forsookest

אַ֗ף <WH637> Even כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when עָשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> Yea when they had made לָהֶם֙ עֵ֣גֶל <WH5695> calf מַסֵּכָ֔ה <WH4541> them a molten וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> This [is] thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Who הֶעֶלְךָ֖ <WH5927> that brought thee up מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> and had wrought נֶאָצ֖וֹת <WH5007> provocations גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <WH1419> great

וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you בְּרַחֲמֶ֣יךָ <WH7356> mercies הָֽרַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> Yet thou in thy manifold לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor עֲזַבְתָּ֖ם <WH5800> forsookest בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> them not in the wilderness אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> the pillar הֶ֠עָנָן <WH6051> of the cloud לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor סָ֨ר <WH5493> departed מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5921> by בְּיוֹמָם֙ <WH3119> not from them by day לְהַנְחֹתָ֣ם <WH5148> to lead בְּהַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> them in the way וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֨וּד <WH5982> neither the pillar הָאֵ֤שׁ <WH784> of fire בְּלַ֙יְלָה֙ <WH3915> by night לְהָאִ֣יר <WH215> to shew them light לָהֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> and the way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יֵֽלְכוּ־ <WH1980> go בָֽהּ׃

וְרוּחֲךָ֨ <WH7307> spirit הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> also thy good נָתַ֖תָּ <WH5414> Thou gavest לְהַשְׂכִּילָ֑ם <WH7919> to instruct וּמַנְךָ֙ <WH4478> not thy manna לֹא־ <WH3808> did not מָנַ֣עְתָּ <WH4513> them and withheldest מִפִּיהֶ֔ם <WH6310> from their mouth וּמַ֛יִם <WH4325> them water נָתַ֥תָּה <WH5414> and gavest לָהֶ֖ם לִצְמָאָֽם׃ <WH6772> for their thirst
